incentives.name: Texas Property Tax Exemption for Solar
incentives.description: Solar system value is not considered when determining assessed property value. Prevents property tax increase from solar installation. Average 4%+ home value increase is tax-free.

incentives.name: Texas Sales Tax Exemption for Solar
incentives.description: Solar energy equipment exempt from state sales tax

incentives.name: Texas Utility Solar Rebates
incentives.description: AEP Texas: up to $2,500 per residential solar system. Oncor: solar+storage rebate. Other utilities vary.

incentives.name: Texas Net Metering (No Statewide Mandate)
incentives.description: No statewide net metering requirement. Some utilities (TXU Energy, others) voluntarily offer net metering or buy-back programs.
incentives.value: Varies by utility - no statewide mandate
